TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit WindowsRuntimeMetadata extends System.Object
public ref class WindowsRuntimeMetadata abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供事件，用于解析仅反射类型请求，用于 Windows 元数据文件提供的类型，以及执行解析的方法。

span.span: Provides an event for resolving reflection-only type requests for types that are provided by Windows Metadata files, and methods for performing the resolution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与.NET Framework 中，不同程序集标识并不重要的[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]类型。Unlike the .NET Framework, assembly identity isn’t important for [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] types. 在[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]，Windows 元数据文件 (。WinMD 文件） 包含仅元数据，不是代码。In the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)], Windows Metadata files (.WinMD files) contain only metadata, not code. 类型可以在一个 Windows 元数据文件移动到另一个在服务包版本中，因此，必须能够找到与命名空间关联的 Windows 元数据文件。Types can move from one Windows Metadata file to another in a service pack release, so it’s important to be able to locate the Windows Metadata files that are associated with a namespace. > [!NOTE] > 子命名空间不表示包含关系。Sub-namespaces don’t imply containment. 也就是说，命名空间 A.B 不包含在命名空间 a。That is, namespace A.B isn't contained in namespace A.

MemberSignature.Value: public static event EventHandler<System.Runtime.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.DesignerNamespaceResolveEventArgs> DesignerNamespaceResolve;
.event class System.EventHandler`1<class System.Runtime.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.DesignerNamespaceResolveEventArgs> DesignerNamespaceResolve
Public Shared Custom Event DesignerNamespaceResolve As EventHandler(Of DesignerNamespaceResolveEventArgs)
public: static event EventHandler<System::Runtime::InteropServices::WindowsRuntime::DesignerNamespaceResolveEventArgs ^> ^ DesignerNamespaceResolve;
member this.DesignerNamespaceResolve : EventHandler<System.Runtime.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.DesignerNamespaceResolveEventArgs>

summary.span: 当 Windows Metadata 文件解析在设计环境中失败时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the resolution of a Windows Metadata file fails in the design environment.

permission.span: 直接调用方需要完全信任。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 不能由部分受信任的或透明的代码使用此成员。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

Public Shared Custom Event ReflectionOnlyNamespaceResolve As EventHandler(Of NamespaceResolveEventArgs)
public: static event EventHandler<System::Runtime::InteropServices::WindowsRuntime::NamespaceResolveEventArgs ^> ^ ReflectionOnlyNamespaceResolve;
member this.ReflectionOnlyNamespaceResolve : EventHandler<System.Runtime.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.NamespaceResolveEventArgs>

summary.span: 当 Windows 元数据文件的解析在仅限反射的上下文中失败时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the resolution of a Windows Metadata file fails in the reflection-only context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发并处理此事件后，它是不能在应用程序域的生存期内再次引发。After this event is raised and handled, it is not raised again for the lifetime of the application domain. 不能更改定义了命名空间的文件列表。The list of files that defines the namespace cannot be changed. 此事件是类似于托管程序集事件。This event is analogous to the event for managed assemblies. 请参阅 类。See the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此事件的事件处理程序不应引发异常。The event handler for this event should not throw exceptions.

permission.span: 直接调用方需要完全信任。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 不能由部分受信任的或透明的代码使用此成员。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

summary.span: 找到指定命名空间的 Windows Metadata 文件，给定位置列表搜索。

span.span: Locates the Windows Metadata files for a specified namespace, given a list of locations to search.

span.span: The namespace to resolve.

param.name: packageGraphFilePaths
param.span: 要搜索 Windows 元数据文件的应用程序路径，或仅要搜索操作系统安装中的 Windows 元数据文件。

span.span: The application paths to search for Windows Metadata files, or to search only for Windows Metadata files from the operating system installation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法重载是等效于调用方法重载并指定`null`为`windowsSdkFilePath`参数。Calling this method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying `null` for the `windowsSdkFilePath` parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为指定的路径`windowsSdkFilePath`仅搜索以 Windows 开头的命名空间。The path you specify for `windowsSdkFilePath` is searched only for namespaces that begin with Windows.
